metadata.title: CVE-2019-10751 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: All versions of the HTTPie package prior to version 1.0.3 are vulnerable toOpen Redirect that allows an attacker to write an arbitrary file withsupplied filename and content to the current directory, by redirecting arequest from HTTP to a crafted URL pointing to a server in his or herscontrol.

criterions.comment: httpie package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
